thread.title: The White House mailbox is full of postcards to #PresidentBannon
thread.title_full: The White House mailbox is full of postcards to #PresidentBannon

author: Sasha Lekach
title: The White House mailbox is full of postcards to #PresidentBannon
text:
A new letter-writing campaign is in the mail ‚Äî and the lucky recipient is Donald Trump's senior adviser Steve Bannon .
For anyone who wants to share their thoughts about Trump and his policy decisions and plans as president, many are turning instead to Bannon.
SEE ALSO: The internet wants Rosie O'Donnell to play Steve Bannon on 'SNL'...and she's into it
The former Breitbart News chairman is believed to be the mastermind behind Trump's executive order banning Muslims, refugees and other immigrants from entering the country and setting the tone of the administration, especially with his unprecedented appointment to the National Security Council.
Since it seems Bannon is calling the shots, concerned citizens are calling him President Bannon (a joke SNL went with for their cold open over the weekend). And as one does when issues come up with a government official as important as president, Bannon's constituents are sending him mail.
But before the letters and postcards get sent to the White House where President Bannon sits at a desk in the Oval Office (at least that's how SNL envisions it), people are snapping shots of their political correspondence.
The hashtag #PostcardstoBannon includes tons of stamps, handwritten notes and letters addressed to 1600 Pennsylvania Ave with the words "Bannon" and "President" clearly labeled.
My contribution to the #PostcardsToBannon campaign is on its way. Get a postcard, address it to #PresidentBannon , tell him what you think! pic.twitter.com/9TPEiVZgKc
‚Äî Justin Hendrix (@justinhendrix) February 6, 2017
@justinhendrix Here's mine w GW purpleheart stamp (how appropriate lol) w a peek of my lil' note! üòÜ #postcardstobannon #president bannon pic.twitter.com/2Js5Bzzxs3
‚Äî NYCity (@NYCisplacetobe) February 7, 2017
#PostcardsToBannon pic.twitter.com/bBZwzonRNp
‚Äî Gracia Carlson (@gcarlso) February 7, 2017
Hey #PresidentBannon , don't let Trumpie make the place tacky. #WereBetterThanThat #TerribleTaste #PostcardstoBannon pic.twitter.com/glqZBzKA5G
‚Äî Notes 2 Pres Bannon (@Note2PresBannon) February 7, 2017
Thanks for taking lil' Donnie under your fetid, dark wing as your apprentice. #PresidentBannon #PostcardsToBannon pic.twitter.com/EcwmWoxp0n
‚Äî Meg Franklin (@Gabooldra) February 7, 2017
@LilCalamityJane @justinhendrix fixed! Doggo hopes the #socalledpresident and #PresidentBannon enjoy! üòÇ üê∂ pic.twitter.com/xAH1c2VXi1
‚Äî üê¶ (@BirdieCrossing) February 7, 2017
#PostcardsToBannon #PresidentBannon here is my postcard ready to go. pic.twitter.com/5AeIi6sjBs
‚Äî Robin O'Hearn (@RobinOHearn) February 7, 2017
Let's just hope Trump doesn't catch sight of all this correspondence for President Bannon.
